body:
Hey guys, if you play Hearthstone, comment down below your BattleTag below, what class if your favourite, and if you play wild or standard. Also give me your opinions on the new cards coming along with One night in Karazhan expansion! I personally think the Fool's Bane with the Violet Illusionist is too OP for Warrior. Also I am looking foward to Prince Malchezaar.

Mine is SuperMage#16543
I play Wild
My main deck is mage
